climbs.name: Sunset Shaman
climbs.fa: Tom Slater, Coby Whitaker, Matt Geyer, Tom Hall

content.description: This is the sport climb located on the left side of the Vision Quest Cliff.
content.protection: Five bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: scramble up through some bushes to get to the start of this climb.  The route goes up a water runnel or chute.

content.description: Start on the right facing crack/ramp and climb up the face to a bolt. Continue up to the lower angle slab with knobs and jugs. To descend, single rap with 80 meters rope (watch out for rope eating flakes), or rap to the anchor of Rainbow Oyster.
content.protection: One bolt, slings to tie off knobs. You can also find some placement of small gear, but tricky. Same anchor of Cosmic Rodeo (chains)
content.location: Starts in the obvious right facing crack/ramp. Same anchor of "Cosmic Rodeo".

content.protection: Five bolts and some cams in the range of 0.4-1".  Quickclip anchors.

content.description: Follow a steep lie back seam straight up with smeary feet. Pull out onto the golden face for some technical edging and punch it up and out of the roof to the chains. There's always a bolt right when you need it.
content.location: Directly downhill and right of Rainbow Oyster

content.description: Start in corner and head straight up onto the highly featured face. Increasingly easy climbing as you near the top.
content.protection: Nuts or cams (esp) start; tie-off knobs higher up; 2 bolt anchor at top w chains
content.location: Start is ca. 8 feet right of the arrete (Rainbow Oyster). Rap down past Sunset Shaman--fine w 60m rope.
